verses.verse: ( Pakhonchatpa taranithoi) ( (Mrk 3:13-19; Luk 6:12-16)) Adudagi Jisuna mahakki tung-inba taranithoi adubu mahakki manakta kouraduna phattaba thawaising tanthoknaba amasung laina khuding amadi anaba khudingbu phahannaba Ibungona makhoida matik pibire.
Pakhonchatpa makhoi taranithoi adugi mamingdi, ahanbada, Peter kouba Simon amasung mahakki manao Andrew; Zebedee-gi machanupa Jacob amasung mahakki manao John;
Philip amasung Bartholomew; Thomas amasung kanggat khomba Matthew; Alphaeus-gi machanupa Jacob amasung Thaddaeus;
mareibak ningba Simon amasung Ibungobu yeknabasinggi khutta pithokkhiba Judas Iscariot, hairibasing asini.

( Jisuna makhoi taranithoibu thaba) ( (Mrk 6:7-13; Luk 9:1-6)) Adudagi Jisuna yathangsing asi piraduna makhoi taranithoibu tharammi. Yathangsing adudi: “Nakhoina Jihudi nattaba phurupsingna leiba maphamsingda chatluganu aduga Samaria machasinggi saharsingdasu changganu.
Adugi mahutta, nakhoina mangkhraba yaogi masak oiraba Israel-gi misinggi maphamda chatlu.
( Luk 10:4-12) Aduga nakhoina chatpa matamda, ‘Swarga leibak adu naksillakle!’ haiduna makhoida sandok-u.
Anabasingbu phahallu, asibasingbu hinggat-hallu, kiningngai oiba unsagi lainana nabasingbu phahanduna senghallu, phattaba thawaisingbu tanthok-u. Nakhoina lemna phangbagumna nakhoina lemna pinou.
Nakhoigi senggaoda sana, lupa, nattraga korigi sel-mayek puganu.
( 1 Cor 9:14; 1 Tim 5:18) Aduga nakhoigi khongchat adugidamak khao, sandal, cheisu nattraga phurit ani suna puganu; maramdi thabak suba mina mahakki chinjak phangba matik chai.

“Nakhoina sahar nattraga khunggang amada changba matamda, nakhoina leibada matik chaba mi kana mapham aduda leibage haibadu thidok-u aduga nakhoina mapham adu thadoktriba phaoba mahakki yum aduda leiyu.
Amasung nakhoina yum aduda changba matamda asumna haiyu, ‘Nakhoida ingthaba oisanu.’
Aduga imung aduna matik charabadi, nakhoigi ingthabagi yaipha thoujal adu makhoida leisanu; adubu imung aduna matik chadrabadi, nakhoigi ingthabagi yaipha thoujal adu nakhoida hallaksanu.
( Pakhon 13:51) Aduga kanagumbana nakhoibu lousindrabadi nattraga nakhoigi wasing adu tadrabadi, nakhoina imung adu nattraga sahar adu thadokpa matamda nakhoigi khongyagi uphul adu kanthoklammu.
( Mat 11:24) Eina nakhoida tasengnamak hairibasini, wayenbagi numit aduda Sodom amasung Gomorrah-gi lamna sahar adudagi henna saphagani.
( Lakkadaba awa ana) ( (Mrk 13:9-13; Luk 21:12-17)) ( Luk 10:3) “Yeng-u, eina nakhoibu keisalgi marakta yaogumna thari, maram aduna nakhoina lin-gumna sing-u, amasung khunugumna pukchel ting-u.
( Mrk 13:9-11; Luk 12: ; :) Aduga nakhoi cheksillu, maramdi nakhoibu wayel-sangsingda pukhatkani amasung synagogue-singda nakhoibu phugani.
Aduga eigi maramgidamak nakhoibu leingakpasing amasung ningthousinggi mamangda, makhoida amadi atoppa phurupsingda sakhi pinabagidamak pukhatkani.

Adubu makhoina nakhoibu phaba matamda, nakhoina kari haigadage nattraga kamdouna haigadage haibagidamak karisu langtaknaganu. Maramdi pungpham aduda nakhoina haigadaba waheising adu nakhoida pibigani.
Maramdi ngangliba adu nakhoina natte, adubu nakhoigi Napa Ibungogi Thawaina waheising adu nakhoida nganghanbigani.

( Mrk 13:12; Luk 21:16) “Aduga machin manaona machin manaobu hat-hannaba pithokkani, matou asigumna mapana machasingbusu pithokkani amasung machasingna mama-mapagi maiyokta leptuna makhoibu hat-han-gani.
( Mat 24:9; Mrk 13:13; Luk 21:17; Mat 24:13; Mrk 13:13) Mi pumnamakna eigi maramgidamak nakhoibu yengthigani. Adubu aroiba phaoba chetna lepchaba mahak adubu kanbigani.

Adubu makhoina nakhoibu sahar amada ot-neirabadi, nakhoina atoppa amada chellu. Eina nakhoida tasengnamak hairibasini, Migi Machanupa aduna lenglaktringei mamangda nakhoina Israel-gi saharsing pumnamak sin-thungna chatpa nangloi.
( Luk 6:40; Jn 13:16; 15:20) “Tung-inba amana mahakki ojagi mathakta leite, aduga manaina mahakki mapudagi henna chaode.

( Mat 9:34; 12:24; Mrk 3:22; Luk 11:15) Tung-inbasingna makhoigi ojagum amasung manaina makhoigi mapugum oirakpa aduna okle. Aduga yumgi yumburen aduda Beelzebul haina makhoina kourabadi, mahakki imunggi misingdadi kayada henna thina kougadaba!
( Eikhoina kanabu kigani) ( (Luk 12:2-7)) ( Mrk 4:22; Luk 8:17) “Adubu nakhoina misingbu kiganu. Maramdi phongdokloidaba kupsinba karisu leite, aduga khangloidaba arotpa amata leite.
Eina nakhoida amambada haiba adu, nakhoina anganbada haidok-u; aduga nakhoigi nakong khaktana takhibasing adu nakhoina yumthaktagi laothok-u.
Aduga hakchangbu hatlaga, thawaibudi hatpa ngamdaba makhoising adubu kiganu; adubu thawai amasung hakchang animakpu norokta manghanba ngamba Ibungo mahakpu kiyu.
Sendrang anibu peisa amada yonba nattra? Adumakpu nakhoigi Napa Ibungona yabiba nattanadi makhoigi maraktagi ama phaoba siduna leimaida taroi.
Aduga nakhoigi kokta sam masing kaya houribage haiba phaoba Tengban Mapuna khanglibani.
Maram aduna kiganu; nakhoidi sendrang kayadagisu henna mamal yamba helli.
( Haidokchaba amasung Jisubu yadaba) ( (Luk 12: 490 8:9 )) “Maram aduna misinggi mamangda eigi tung-inbani haina yajaba mahak adubu swargada leiba Ipagi mangda einasu yabigani.
( 2 Tim 2:12) Adubu misinggi mangda eibu yadaba mahak adubu einasu swargada leiba Ipagi mangda yabiroi.

( Ingthaba piba lakpa natte thangsang piba lakpani) ( (Luk 12:51-53; 14:26-27)) “Eina taibangpan asida ingthaba piba lakpani haina khan-ganu. Eina ingthaba piba lakpa natte, adubu thangsang piba lakpani.
( Mic 7:6) Maramdi machanupasingna makhoigi mapagi maiyokta, machanupisingna makhoigi mamagi maiyokta aduga mamou nupisingna manemboksinggi maiyokta leihannaba ei lakpani.
Mi amagi yeknaba adu mahak masagi imung manunggi misingna oigani.
“Mapa nattraga mamabu eingondagi henna nungsiba mahak adu eigi oibada matik chade; aduga machanupa nattraga machanupibu eingondagi henna nungsiba mahak adu eigi oibada matik chade.
( Mat 16:24; Mrk 8:34; Luk 9:23) Aduga mahakki cross thanggattuna eigi tung indaba mahak adu eigi oibada matik chade.
( Mat 16:25; Mrk 8:35; Luk 9:24; 17:33; Jn 12:25) Mathawai kanjaba mahak aduna madu mangjagani; aduga eigi maramgidamak mathawai mangjaba mahak aduna madu phangjagani.

( Tengban Mapuda toujaba thabak khudingmakki mana Lei) ( (Mrk 9:41)) ( Luk 10:16; Jn 13:20; Mrk 9:37; Luk 9:48) “Nakhoibu lousinba mahak aduna eibu lousinbani, aduga eibu lousinba mahak aduna eibu tharakpa mahak adubu lousinbani.

Kanagumba amana Tengban Mapugi wa phongdokpa mi amabu Tengban Mapugi wa phongdokpa mi ama oina lousinjarabadi Tengban Mapugi wa phongdokpa mi aduna phanggadaba mana adumak mahaknasu phangjagani; aduga kanagumba amana achumba chatpa mi amabu achumba chatpa mi ama oibagi maramna lousillabadi achumba chatpa mi aduna phanggadaba mana adumak mahaknasu phangjagani.
Aduga kanagumbana apikpasing asigi maraktagi amada eigi tung-inba oibagi maramna ayingba ising glass ama pirabadi, eina nakhoida tasengnamak hairibasini, mahakna mahakki mana khak mangloi.”
